value.name: Gallatin, Tennessee: The Town That Rose Above Tragedy to Become 2017’s Nicest Place in America
value.description: On April 6, 2016, James Spray, a white police officer in Gallatin, Tennessee, responded to a call about an eviction going bad. When he got out of the car, he encountered Laronda Sweatt ...

value.name: Tennessee police officer fatally shoots ax-wielding woman
value.description: "She wasn't a bad person," Ella Sweatt said. "She didn't weigh but 94 pounds." The police report said Laronda Sweatt was shot twice. "I want to know why he did her like that," Ella Sweatt said.
